name: KafkaProducer
description: This custom task integrates with Azure DevOps pipelines to process files within your build artifacts and publish their content as Kafka messages. It provides flexibility to define message headers and keys based on pipeline variables and the source filename
author: Fabrikam Champions

inputs.name: filePath
inputs.label: File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: The path of kafka message files

inputs.name: validateContent
inputs.label: Validate JSON
inputs.helpMarkDown: Ensure that kafka message files have valid JSON content

inputs.name: headers
inputs.label: Headers
inputs.helpMarkDown: The kafka message headers JSON object

inputs.name: producerConfig
inputs.label: Producer Config
inputs.helpMarkDown: The kafka producer config JSON object
